lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Amélie Mauresmo defeated Lindsay Davenport, 6-4, 6-3, yesterday to advance to the semifinals of the China Open in Beijing. Mauresmo beat Davenport for the first time in 10 matches, since the final of the Sydney International in 2000, and is 4-12 against her over all. Mauresmo will face sixth-seeded Jelena Jankovic, who topped Nadia Petrova, 6-4, 4-6, 6-2.
